DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of incidence of invasive aspergillosis in patients who have undergone an allogeneic stem cell transplantation, with particular regard to the role of galactomannan assay and of early TC scan in asymptomatic patients.
DOC.brief_title: Invasive Aspergillosis After Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation (HSCT)
DOC.criteria: Age > 16 years Allogeneic HSCT for a haematological disease Written informed consent to the study Pediatric patients
